snippet: A judge rejected Macy’s request for a temporary restraining order blocking J.C. Penney from selling Martha Stewart goods  while it appeals a ruling allowing the sale.
lead_paragraph: A judge rejected Macy’s request for a temporary restraining order blocking J.C. Penney from selling Martha Stewart goods  while it appeals a ruling allowing the sale.

headline.seo: Penney Sales of Martha Stewart Goods Allowed
headline.main: Penney Sales of Stewart Goods Allowed
